title: The Listerdale Mystery and Eleven Other Stories
description: First published in 1934, this collection of Agatha Christie short stories features 12 ingenious tales involving mystery and adventure, from a stolen rajah's emerald to a necklace discovered in a basket of cherries to a mystery writer's bizarre near-arrest for murder. The Listerdale mysteryPhilomel CottageThe girl in the trainSing a song of sixpenceThe manhood of Edward RobinsonAccidentJane in search of a jobA fruitful SundayMr Eastowood's adventureThe golden ballThe Rajah's emeraldSwan song
author: Agatha Christie
